property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}: Angelfire Crusader gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nothing burns hotter than the fires of holy rage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature you control Enchanted creature is a Flagbearer. While an opponent is choosing targets as part of casting a spell they control or activating an ability they control, that player must choose at least one Flagbearer on the battlefield if able.

property.name: Rules
property.value: While an opponent is choosing targets as part of casting a spell they control or activating an ability they control, that player must choose at least one Flagbearer on the battlefield if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Giving little thought to their own defense, they carried the flag that united their army.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn. {R}, {T}: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is no true equity of power. There is only more and less."

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a black or red permanent, you gain 2 life. If you control a black permanent and a red permanent, you gain 4 life instead.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Tap two untapped creatures you control: Tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's the oldest trick in the book," said Guff. "And I ought to know - I wrote it."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn to creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Phyrexia is an unforgiving place, and I am an angry lord in an unforgiving mood." - Lord Windgrace

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike When Enlistment Officer enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Soldier cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, spells and abilities you control that would add colored mana instead add that much white mana. Until end of turn, you may spend white mana as though it were mana of any color. Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 1 life for each card in target opponent's hand. {3}{W}: Tap target creature. Activate only if Gerrard Capashen is attacking.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Haunted Angel dies, exile Haunted Angel and each other player creates a 3/3 black Angel creature token with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hope kept the defenders aloft, but only courage kept them in the fight.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack. {B}: Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. {R}: Enchanted creature can't block this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.) Destroy target artifact or enchantment. If this spell was kicked, it deals damage equal to that permanent's mana value to target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has protection from green and from blue.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The duty: to defend. The reason: to survive.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protection from green {B}: Regenerate Spectral Lynx.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A shadowy version of its corporeal cousin, this lynx hunts souls, not meals.

property.name: Rules
property.value: While an opponent is choosing targets as part of casting a spell they control or activating an ability they control, that player must choose at least one Flagbearer on the battlefield if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The standard was a rallying point for the army and a target for the enemy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}, {T}: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. {G}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The sea holds all that you need. You simply must know how to ask for it."

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a red or green permanent, draw a card, then discard a card. If you control a red permanent and a green permanent, instead draw two cards, then discard a card.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Flying {1}{U}, {T}: Return target Kavu to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the kavu emerged from their ancient nests, food chains long dormant became vibrant again.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Domain - Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each basic land type among lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Effective use of terrain is a lesson good commanders learn quickly.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a spell, any other player may pay that spell's mana cost. If a player does, counter the spell. +lt;I+gt;(Mana cost includes color.)+lt;/I+gt;

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the oppresive cold of the cave could not temper Eladamri's ire.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top five cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let's see . . . Mercadia, mercenary, merfolk . . . you know, I really need a better filing system."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell if it shares a color with a creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Calm down everyone; it's nothing we haven't seen before." - Sisay

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {1}{R} (You may pay an additional {1}{R} as you cast this spell.) Return target creature to its owner's hand. If this spell was kicked, it deals 2 damage to another target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You're not my Hanna" - Gerrard, to Yawgmoth

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ship has a crew of three: the pilot, the gunner, and the ship itself.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target land becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With one gesture, she can render a thousand years of navigational charts obsolete.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target land becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Oh, is that all you need? Why didn't you just say so?" - Reef shaman

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Tidal Courier enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Merfolk cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. {3}{U}: Tidal Courier gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}: Choose a creature type other than Wall. Target creature becomes that type until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What nature makes, magic can modify.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target instant or sorcery spell becomes the color of your choice.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sometimes when I look at the ocean, I could swear it changes colors." - Sisay

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Whirlpool Drake enters the battlefield, shuffle the cards from your hand into your library, then draw that many cards. When Whirlpool Drake dies, shuffle the cards from your hand into your library, then draw that many cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Whirlpool Rider enters the battlefield, shuffle the cards from your hand into your library, then draw that many cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Where the wind meets the water, change is inevitable.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Whirlpool Warrior enters the battlefield, shuffle the cards from your hand into your library, then draw that many cards. {R}, Sacrifice Whirlpool Warrior: Each player shuffles the cards from their hand into their library, then draws that many cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy two target nonblack creatures unless either one is a color the other isn't. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Beautiful, isn't it?" crowed Crovax. "They fought together. Now they will die together."

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 and has "{T}: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Phyrexians have one word that means both "evolution" and "pain."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Grave Defiler enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Zombie cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. {1}{B}: Regenerate Grave Defiler.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Target player reveals their hand and discards all cards of each of the sacrificed creature's colors.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Treated with a powerful mix of herbs and potions, its wrappings have a remarkable preservative effect, even for the living.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}, {T}: Add one mana of any color. {W}, {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a green or white permanent, target player loses 1 life. If you control a green permanent and a white permanent, that player loses 3 life instead.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An audience of one with the malice of thousands.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Phyrexian Gargantua enters the battlefield, you draw two cards and you lose 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Other Phyrexians have nightmares about the gargantua.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Phyrexian Rager enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It takes no prisoners, but it keeps the choicest bits for Phyrexia.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Domain - All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn for each basic land type among lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All of Dominaria recoiled as Yawgmoth and his retainers arrived.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the druids had devoted their lives to preserving Dominaria, so did they devote their deaths.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player exiles all cards from their hand face down. At the beginning of the end step of that player's next turn, that player returns those cards to their hand.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Terese Nielsen and Thomas M. Baxa

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In Urborg, few things are less permanent than death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{B}: Choose a color. Whenever Zombie Boa becomes blocked by a creature of that color this turn, destroy that creature. Activate only as a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It doesn't need to feed, but still it hungers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}, Sacrifice Bloodfire Colossus: It deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It took all its strength to contain the fire within.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}, Sacrifice Bloodfire Dwarf: It deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For them, the only honorable death is one that leaves a crater.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature you control {R}, Sacrifice enchanted creature: Bloodfire Infusion deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to each creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}, Sacrifice Bloodfire Kavu: It deals 2 damage to each creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Heart of fire, blood of lava, teeth of stone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {W}{W} (You may pay an additional {W}{W} as you cast this spell.) When Desolation Giant enters the battlefield, destroy all other creatures you control. If it was kicked, destroy all other creatures instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker - {2}{R}, Sacrifice a land. (You may pay {2}{R} and sacrifice a land in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.) Destroy target land. If this spell was kicked, destroy another target land.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dwarven Patrol doesn't untap during your untap step. Whenever you cast a nonred spell, untap Dwarven Patrol.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dwarves never worry about who watches their backs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) When Goblin Ringleader enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Goblin cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {2}{R} and/or {3}{U} (You may pay an additional {2}{R} and/or {3}{U} as you cast this spell.) Illuminate deals X damage to target creature. If this spell was kicked with its {2}{R} kicker, it deals X damage to that creature's controller. If this spell was kicked with its {3}{U} kicker, you draw X cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}: Kavu Glider gets +0/+1 until end of turn. {U}: Kavu Glider gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Minotaur Tactician gets +1/+1 as long as you control a white creature. Minotaur Tactician gets +1/+1 as long as you control a blue creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}, {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn. {U}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a white or blue permanent, Raka Sanctuary deals 1 damage to target creature. If you control a white permanent and a blue permanent, Raka Sanctuary deals 3 damage instead.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They're ugly, and they're in my way." - Tahngarth

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top three cards of target opponent's library, then put them back in any order. That player looks at the top three cards of your library, then puts them back in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target land becomes a Plains or an Island until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A cross between a jaguar and an armadillo.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{W}: Search your library for an enchantment card and reveal that card. Put it into your hand, then discard a card at random. Then shuffle. {1}{U}: Search your library for an instant card and reveal that card. Put it into your hand, then discard a card at random. Then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {U}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. {B}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The blessings of Gaea alone are no longer enough."

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a blue or black permanent, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. If you control a blue permanent and a black permanent, that creature gets +5/+5 until end of turn instead.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a black spell, Bog Gnarr gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not all of Dominaria's defenders were nourished by the light.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice five lands. Search your library for a land card of each basic land type, put those cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a blue spell, Glade Gnarr gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Long thought merely a legend, the appearance of the gnarr was seen by the defenders as a sign of good luck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Kavu Howler enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Kavu cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Kavu Mauler attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each other attacking Kavu.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To the kavu, all Phyrexians are merely crunchy snacks.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Victory favors neither the righteous nor the wicked. It favors the prepared.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Penumbra Bobcat dies, create a 2/1 black Cat creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: This cat has two lives and it's hunting for more.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Penumbra Kavu dies, create a 3/3 black Kavu creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These kavu are so stubborn they even refuse to die." - Tahngarth

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample When Penumbra Wurm dies, create a 6/6 black Wurm creature token with trample.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {U}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Savage Gorilla: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: These omnivorous gorillas have no qualms about a diet composed of equal parts fruit and Phyrexians.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {B} (You may pay an additional {B} as you cast this spell.) Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, Zombie creatures you control get an additional +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) When Sylvan Messenger enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Elf cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Skip your draw step. {1}, Tap two untapped creatures you control: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You know your orders. I know your hearts. Now the stronghold will know defeat." - Eladamri

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all enchantments. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Freyalise bought the planeswalkers the time they needed by clearing a path through the misshapen hell of Phyrexia.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The elves of Urborg are as deadly and capricious as the swamp itself.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Create X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens, where X is that creature's mana value.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The next X damage that would be dealt to target creature, planeswalker, or player this turn is dealt to another target creature, planeswalker, or player instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sisay discovered that the mirrored hull of the Weatherlight could be used as a defensive weapon.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Another target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As Multani's troops invaded Urborg, the decay of the swamp became a feast for the living.

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}{B}: Destroy target creature blocking or blocked by Cromat. {U}{R}: Cromat gains flying until end of turn. {B}{G}: Regenerate Cromat. {R}{W}: Cromat gets +1/+1 until end of turn. {G}{U}: Put Cromat on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Death Grasp deals X damage to any target. You gain X life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Yawgmoth's greatest joy came from watching one hero defeat another.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. Create X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens, where X is that creature's mana value.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}{G}: Ebony Treefolk gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its roots are equally happy to drink the water of a clear stream or the oily blood of a Phyrexian warrior.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature you control attacks, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Crovax was nearly buried beneath the weight of his opponents.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Flowstone Charger attacks, it gets +3/-3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A mane of flowstone and a mien of fury.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Fungal Shambler deals damage to an opponent, you draw a card and that opponent discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The grace of the forest and the spirit of the sea.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player discards two cards. You gain 3 life for each land card discarded this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A heart of light and a soul of darkness cannot coexist.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}, Sacrifice Goblin Legionnaire: It deals 2 damage to any target. {W}, Sacrifice Goblin Legionnaire: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, Sacrifice a land: Create two 1/1 red and white Goblin Soldier creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ground rose and formed into thousands of tiny warriors. This fight was far from over.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal the cards in your library. An opponent chooses from among them a creature card, a land card, and a noncreature, nonland card. You put the chosen cards into your hand. Then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) When Jungle Barrier enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A massive pull of mana caused all of Dominaria to pause - Multani had transplanted Yavimaya to Urborg's edge.

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent loses 2 life for each Swamp you control. Last Stand deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control. Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token for each Forest you control. You gain 2 life for each Plains you control. Draw a card for each Island you control, then discard that many cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Just as leaves fall from the branches of a living tree, so too do the dead leave the elfhame.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 2 life: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Honor the brave who fought, Honor the dead who fell, Honor the world they saved. - Memorial inscription

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{U}: Minotaur Illusionist gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.) {R}, Sacrifice Minotaur Illusionist: It deals damage equal to its power to target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash When Mystic Snake enters the battlefield, counter target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its fangs are in your flesh before its hiss leaves your ears.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice a land: You gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The decay of Crovax's ancestral home matched the state of his soul.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {X}, Sacrifice Pernicious Deed: Destroy each artifact, creature, and enchantment with mana value X or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Yawgmoth," Freyalise whispered as she set the bomb, "now you will pay for your treachery."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature attacks or blocks, Powerstone Minefield deals 2 damage to it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We have fought this far and lost too much. We will not turn back." - Grizzlegom

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prophetic Bolt deals 4 damage to any target. Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Putrid Warrior deals damage, choose one - • Each player loses 1 life. • Each player gains 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I do not like it," said Grizzlegom, "but I will take every soldier I can get."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker. You draw a card."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The dwarves call their quicksilver techniques "improvisational weaponsmithing."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Razorfin Hunter deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No one knew if they'd been lurking under the sea all along, or if they'd been created by the Phyrexian overlay.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life. Whenever enchanted creature is dealt damage, you gain that much life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They danced like puppets to a tune only Yawgmoth could hear.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Spiritmonger deals damage to a creature, put a +1/+1 counter on Spiritmonger. {B}: Regenerate Spiritmonger. {G}: Spiritmonger becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2. When enchanted creature dies, return that card to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a number. Flip a coin that many times or until you lose a flip, whichever comes first. If you win all the flips, draw two cards for each flip.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell and Suffocating Blast deals 3 damage to target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target permanent on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One splash of the spring's water knocks you clear into last week.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't mourn for me. This is my destiny." - Gerrard

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature. Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fire deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets. // Tap target permanent. Draw a card.

Rules
property.value: As Brass Herald enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. When Brass Herald enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all creature cards of the chosen type revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. Creatures of the chosen type get +1/+1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Dodecapod, put it onto the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it instead of putting it into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: You may put a multicolored creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In their hunger for the arch's power, mages often forget that it only makes dragons easier to summon. It doesn't make them easier to control.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Exile target permanent. If Legacy Weapon would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal Legacy Weapon and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, if there are four or more basic land types among lands that player controls, Mask of Intolerance deals 3 damage to that player.

property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {R} or {W}. Battlefield Forge deals 1 damage to you.

property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {W} or {B}. Caves of Koilos deals 1 damage to you.

property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {B} or {G}. Llanowar Wastes deals 1 damage to you.

property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {U} or {R}. Shivan Reef deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {G} or {U}. Yavimaya Coast deals 1 damage to you.
